issue.title: [Crossbow] Unable to parse github owner/repository pair
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15453](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15453). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See build log: https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/4939685651?check_suite_focus=true#step:12:118

Should support plain http urls, like 'https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/'
